name: Run! ROBOT
description:
A challenging little endless runner i made with UE4. The goal is to collect as much Dark Matter as possible.

There are 3 different levels to choose from:

  • a Green Galaxy where the game speeds up every 30 seconds
  • a Purple Galaxy where the character has a constant fast speed
  • a Blue Galaxy where the gravity is low and you have to time your jumps

Controls:

  • A/D: Movement/Turn Corner
  • Space: Jump
  • Escape: Main Menu

Graphics:

  • Low
  • Medium
  • High
  • Max

Music is from http://incompetech.com

Assets is free stuff from the marketplace
